title: Calories in Domino's Medium Pizza
meta_description: Discover calories in dominos medium pizza, including total nutrition for a standard cheese version, macros, and variations like toppings or crust types.
assumptions: Hand-tossed crust, cheese pizza (no extra toppings), 12-inch size with 8 slices; values based on Domino's standard recipe.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by crust type, toppings, location, and customizations. Check Domino's app or site for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A Domino's medium cheese pizza has about 1680 kcal total.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Domino's medium cheese pizza?
faqs.a: Approximately 1680 kcal for the whole pizza.

faqs.q: What are the macros for calories in dominos medium pizza?
faqs.a: About 208 g carbs, 64 g protein, 64 g fat.

faqs.q: How many slices in a Domino's medium pizza?
faqs.a: Typically 8 slices, with ~210 kcal per slice for cheese.

faqs.q: Does crust type affect calories in dominos medium pizza?
faqs.a: Yesâ€”thin crust lowers by ~200 kcal; stuffed crust adds ~300 kcal.

faqs.q: How much sodium in a Domino's medium pizza?
faqs.a: Around 3120 mg total, mostly from cheese and sauce.
